title: Quarter of Year
description: In this lab, we will be exploring the concept of date and time manipulation in JavaScript. We will be focusing on a specific function, quarterOfYear, which takes in a date and returns the quarter and year to which the date belongs. By the end of the lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to extract and manipulate date and time information in JavaScript.

meta.title: Mastering Date and Time Manipulation in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to extract and manipulate date and time information in JavaScript with the quarterOfYear function.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript tutor, javascript practice online, javascript lab, manipulation, time, date, quarter

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 年份季度
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索JavaScript中日期和时间操作的概念。我们将重点关注一个特定的函数quarterOfYear，它接受一个日期并返回该日期所属的季度和年份。在实验结束时，你将对如何在JavaScript中提取和操作日期及时间信息有扎实的理解。

meta.title: 精通JavaScript中的日期和时间操作
meta.description: 学习如何使用quarterOfYear函数在JavaScript中提取和操作日期及时间信息。
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript实践, javascript教程, 在线javascript实践, javascript实验, 操作, 时间, 日期, 季度

verify.name: 在Zsh历史记录中验证Node命令
verify.hint: 通过输入'node'并按Enter键，可以在终端/SSH中运行JavaScript。
